descriptionHtml:
went to look around and visit old places since i was 79 and very hard to lvl past.
i went in the man groto where sinding is and transform my self into a werewolf (no ring of hircine equiped or in inventory)
and it passed almoust 2 days in game and i didnt revert to human im tired right now and cant play anymore ingama days i need sleep. but i just had to share this with u guys . ill post a previous save thats is not bugged also maybe someone get the hang of it
author: me
